post.body:
Paris Crypto-Anarchist meetup, not a Crypto-Libertain one, that's not very inclusive.

Paris Crypto-Anarchist meetup #4 June the 20th, 18:00, at the hackerspace << le jack>> @ <<Jardine d'Alice>>, Montreuil, Intended for all leftist revolutionary political forces. It is definitely a Crypto-Anarchist meetup, not a Crypto-Libertain one.
https://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/Crypto-Anarchist-Meetup-Paris/events/249292923/?oc=evam
